title: Business Creation Assistance
description: Assisting user in creating a new business with UI blocks.
summary: The chat involves the user seeking help with creating a new business. The assistant breaks down the process into UI blocks, including a checklist for exploring new business creation with steps like researching market trends and setting up a legal structure. Additionally, a resource card provides useful resources such as a business plan template and LegalZoom for legal services, guiding the user towards the successful creation of their new business.
